dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle financial risks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach investments with extreme caution, avoiding high-risk ventures at all costs.
Your FarTwin will enthusiastically take on high-risk investments, seeking substantial returns and potential for exponential growth.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer to interact with a small group of close friends or engage in solo activities.
Your FarTwin will thrive in social settings, seeking new connections and engaging with large groups.

dimensions.label: Impulsiveness
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin respond to sudden changes or unexpected events?

options.description: Your FarTwin will act on instinct, making spontaneous decisions without fully considering the consequences.
Your FarTwin will take time to think through the implications of a decision, weighing pros and cons before acting.

dimensions.label: Emotional Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their emotions in public?

options.description: Your FarTwin will freely express their emotions, sharing personal feelings with others.
Your FarTwin will maintain a stoic demeanor, hiding their true emotions from public view.

dimensions.label: Strategic Thinking
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach long-term planning and strategy?

options.description: Your FarTwin will meticulously plan and organize, prioritizing tasks to achieve specific goals.
Your FarTwin will adapt and adjust their plans as circumstances arise, embracing flexibility in the face of uncertainty.

dimensions.label: Emotional Intelligence
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin navigate complex emotional situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively listen and try to understand others' perspectives, providing emotional support when needed.
Your FarTwin will maintain a logical distance from emotions, analyzing situations without getting personally invested.

dimensions.label: Adaptability
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle unexpected changes or challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will adjust to new circumstances, being willing to pivot and change plans as needed.
Your FarTwin will resist changes and stick to their original plan, even in the face of adversity.

dimensions.label: Risk vs. Reward
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin weigh potential risks against potential rewards?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prioritize caution, avoiding high-risk options unless absolutely necessary.
Your FarTwin will aggressively pursue high-reward opportunities, willing to take calculated risks to achieve success.
